actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-676.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6324) to authorize appropriations for atmospheric, climatic, and ocean pollution activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the fiscal years 1983 and 1984, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 6324 (National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 6324) to authorize appropriations for atmospheric, climatic, and ocean pollution activities of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration for the fiscal years 1983 and 1984, and for other purposes.
